ai-patthana16.59:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.59:1.1_0: One who has not offensive resentment, but doesn’t give rise to satisfaction, there is no cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.59:1.1_1: One who has not offensive resentment, but doesn’t give rise to satisfaction, there is no cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.59:1.1_2: Some things don’t arise because of impingement, or because of non-greeding, nor do they ask for the sake of repulsion, nor because of failure.
ai-patthana16.59:1.1_4: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana16.59:2.1_0: Not being exerted, not for the sake of non-existence, nor for the sake of non-existence.
ai-patthana16.59:2.1_1: Not being exerted, they don’t give rise to the defilements ...
ai-patthana16.59:2.1_2: Some things don’t give rise to the defilements.
